headline: Tell HN: Microsoft limits GitHub accounts of Russian citizens anywhere
description:
I believe their system limits users based on past payment and IP address history.

Limitation seems to concern paid features only for the time being (I only realized this when I couldn't sponsor a project yesterday).

As long as you are limited, you cannot update your billing address.

The only way to lift the restrictions is the appeals form*, which requires submitting a non-Russian photo ID. Apparently, regardless of where you reside, a Russian user who paid Github from Russia or with a Russian billing address at least once must obtain another citizenship (probably not a problem for the wealthy ones?) to keep using their existing Github account fully.

* https://docs.github.com/en/site-policy/other-site-policies/github-and-trade-controls#how-is-github-ensuring-that-folks-not-living-in-andor-having-professional-links-to-the-sanctioned-countries-and-territories-still-have-access-or-ability-to-appeal
headline_zh-Hans: 告诉HN：微软限制俄罗斯公民在任何地方的GitHub账户
headline_zh-Hant: 告訴HN：微軟限制俄羅斯公民在任何地方的GitHub賬戶
description_zh-Hans:
我相信他们的系统是根据过去的付款和IP地址历史来限制用户的。

限制似乎暂时只涉及付费功能（当我昨天无法赞助一个项目时，我才意识到这一点）。

只要你被限制，你就不能更新你的账单地址。

解除限制的唯一方法是上诉表格*，这需要提交一个非俄罗斯的照片身份证。显然，无论你居住在哪里，一个从俄罗斯支付Github或使用俄罗斯账单地址至少一次的俄罗斯用户必须获得另一个公民身份（对富有的人来说可能不是问题？）才能继续充分使用他们现有的Github账户。

* https://docs.github.com/en/site-policy/other-site-policies/github-and-trade-controls#how-is-github-ensuring-that-folks-not-living-in-andor-having-professional-links-to-the-sanctioned-countries-and-territories-still-have-access-or-ability-to-appeal
description_zh-Hant:

只要你被限制，你就不能更新你的賬單地址。

解除限制的唯一方法是上訴表格*，這需要提交一個非俄羅斯的照片身份證。顯然，無論你居住在哪裡，一個從俄羅斯支付Github或使用俄羅斯賬單地址至少一次的俄羅斯用戶必須獲得另一個公民身份（對富有的人來說可能不是問題？）才能繼續充分使用他們現有的Github賬戶。

* https://docs.github.com/en/site-policy/other-site-policies/github-and-trade-controls#how-is-github-ensuring-that-folks-not-living-in-andor-having-professional-links-to-the-sanctioned-countries-and-territories-still-have-access-or-ability-to-appeal
